thread.section_title: PromGirl Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PromGirl | www.promgirl.com | 11 of 539
thread.title: Cynthia

author: Cynthia
title: Cynthia
text: The Dress was better than expected. Well made and looked amazing on. The only thing I would recommend is order your true size. I measured my daughter and going by the sizing chart she should of been in size 8. She wears a size 12 so I took a chance and ordered size 12 thinking if it was too big I could have it altered. The size 12 fit PERFECT! So therefore I'm glad I didn't order the size 8 or would have had to send back. I Will totally buy her prom dresses from here.
